attributes.action: Increase the amount of Statuatory Maternity Pay for couples, currently paid at £117 per week, especially for those with a mortgage to pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am campaigning for either an increase in weeks on the current 6 weeks allowance (at 90% of average weekly earnings) or an overall increase on SMP for co-habiting couples, married couples or those with  mortgages. Too much focus is given to single parents and the unemployed when couples who are tax and NI payers face a struggle to pay bills whilst on maternity leave. £117 per week does not match up to today's current cost of living especially in today's economy crisis. Where is the support for the British working family?
